title: Downgrade from Enterprise Plan
description: A customer on an 'Enterprise' plan is downgrading and needs to export data from an Enterprise-only feature before they lose access.

tasks.description: Process the plan downgrade request, effective at the end of the month.
Inform the customer they will lose access to the 'Advanced Audit Log' feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the impact of the downgrade.

tasks.description: Guide the customer on how to use the data export tool to save their audit log history before the plan change takes effect.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful instructions to prevent data loss for the customer.
